lsr.player_config.playing: Thou shall beest playing the game
lsr.player_config.spectating: Thou shall beest spectating the game
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.title: The Boogeyman
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.descr: Thou art the Boogeyman. By any means requisite, thou must slay a %1$s or %2$s name through direct action to lift the curse. Shouldst thou fail, in the next session, thou shalt transform into a %3$s name. All allegiances and friendships are forsworn whilst thou art the Boogeyman.
If thou dost not find thyself cured after felling a foe, prithee inform an operator.
lsr.boogeyman.choose.not_the_boogeyman.d: Thou art NAY the Boogeyman. The Boogeyman must, by all means, slay a %1$s or %2$s by direct deed to be freed of the curse. All allegiences and friendships are forsworn whilst they art the Boogeyman. Take heed of them!
lsr.session.start: The session hath commenced. Good fortune!
lsr.boogeyman.punish.description.p1: Thou didst fail to slay a %1$s or %2$s name in yonder last session as the Boogeyman. For thy transgression, thou hast fallen to thy %3$s. All allegiences and friendships are forsworn, and thou art now hostile to all players. Thou mayest join with others in their Last Life, if thou dost desire.
lsr.menu.credits.title: Attributions
lsr.menu.pack.title: Life Series Recreation
lsr.misc.last_life.p1: Thou hast falled to thy %s. All allegiances art forsworn and thou art now hostile towards all other players. Thou mayest ally with others on their Last Life, if thou dost desire.
lsr.util.check_operator_status.p2: Run %s to unveil the Primary Menu
lsr.misc.eliminated.title: Thou hast been cast out
lsr.boogeyman.cure.not_enough_players: Thou art cured, for there is none left for thee to slay.
lsr.menu.credits.developers.title: Craftsmen
lsr.menu.credits.testers.title: Trialers
lsr.menu.credits.translators.title: translatours
